item.title: Giant pile of burning crap
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: A 2,000 ton mound of cow manure in Nebraska has been burning continuously for three months, to the dismay of the Nebraska Department of Environmental Quality, which says the smoke is in violation of pollution laws. (Link courtesy of BoingBoing)
item.excerpt:encoded: A 2,000 ton mound of cow manure in Nebraska has been burning continuously for three months, to the dismay of the Nebraska Department of Environmental Quality, which says the smoke is in violation of pollution laws. (Link courtesy of BoingBoing)
